attributes.action: Provide Better Waste Disposal Regulations and Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the present time too much confusion arises throughout the country as to which council collects what waste etc.
Propose that one common set of laws be enacted to cover all area's of the country with no exceptions.
Suggest Paper Carboard Glass Metal Plastic Green Waste be collected separately as now. 
All other waste be collected in Bins and Bags.
